backend/main.mo: Provides two public query endpoints for health status and version reporting.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/.env.example: Documents environment variables, mainly the crypto refresh interval defaulting to 300000ms with minimum 1000ms.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the frontend root element and main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component combining theme toggle, backend health check, and crypto dashboard layout.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button component that switches between light and dark themes using useTheme.
frontend/src/features/crypto/CryptoDashb: Dashboard UI showing crypto data table with refresh interval selector, loading states, and error handling.
frontend/src/features/crypto/cryptoRefre: Parses and validates crypto refresh interval env var, supplying defaults and conversion helpers.
frontend/src/features/crypto/RefreshInte: Renders selectable preset refresh interval buttons and emits changes via onChange.
frontend/src/features/crypto/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for crypto asset data and API response shapes.
frontend/src/features/crypto/useCryptoMa: Fetches and maps CoinGecko market data with React Query using configurable refresh intervals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches backend actors based on user identity, invalidating dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for calling backend actor methods to fetch health and version information.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Implements a light/dark theme hook with localStorage persistence and DOM class toggling.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then mounts the app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, theme extensions, custom colors from CSS variables, plugins, and animations.
project_state.json: Captures project metadata, current state, decisions, issues, and requirements for the crypto dashboard app.
